title: [Help] No new missions are available for me to complete!
body:
Greetings, 
I've recently completed all my missions and received its order tokens reward, until the day that came, when i opened my Lol account and found that i have 13 minutes to do the 2 missions, i played against bots, won them at 9 min exactly, then i received my first mission reward, the second mission was wasted :( 
since then, no new missions available for me!! 
Why so? 
please i want a decent reply.

replies.body: The current missions were only being offered during the Vs Event. Since that event ended the [**missions **](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008256847)have gone with it, but they'll be coming back pretty soon!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=FhoQEhlx,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-01T20:25:41.355+0000)
>
> The current missions were only being offered during the Vs Event. Since that event ended the [**missions **](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008256847)have gone with it, but they'll be coming back pretty soon!

I have not had any missions what so ever since the event ended. Is that normal?
